thread.title: BRIEF-Novocure Reports Positive Top-Line Results From Stellar Phase 2 Pilot Trial In Mesothelioma

title: BRIEF-Novocure Reports Positive Top-Line Results From Stellar Phase 2 Pilot Trial In Mesothelioma
text:
April 17, 2018 / 2:08 PM / Updated 30 minutes ago BRIEF-Novocure Reports Positive Top-Line Results From Stellar Phase 2 Pilot Trial In Mesothelioma Reuters Staff 
April 17 (Reuters) - Novocure Ltd: 
* NOVOCURE REPORTS POSITIVE TOP-LINE RESULTS FROM STELLAR PHASE 2 PILOT TRIAL IN MESOTHELIOMA 
* NOVOCURE LTD - FINAL STELLAR DATA EXCEEDED RESULTS OF INTERIM ANALYSIS FOR ALL EFFICACY ENDPOINTS 
* NOVOCURE LTD - NOVOCURE PLANS TO SUBMIT A HUMANITARIAN DEVICE EXEMPTION APPLICATION TO FDA FOR APPROVAL Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
